mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, password, email, nickname, phone_number, birth_date, sex, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birthDate}, #{sex}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, nickname as nickName, email as email, birth_date as birthDate, phone_number as phoneNumber, sex as sex, profile_img as profileImg, introduction as introduction, created_at as createdAt FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT u.nickname, COUNT(*) AS value FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.type = 2 GROUP BY u.nickname ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT u.nickname, SUM(b.like_count) AS value FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY u.nickname ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT u.nickname, COUNT(DISTINCT b.badge) AS value FROM user u LEFT JOIN badges b ON u.user_id = b.user_id GROUP BY u.nickname ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 10
